name: Cross-Agent Identity Audit
description: All agents verify each other's identity and credential state. IronClaw orchestrates.
process: Query IronClaw identity state via juggler_status()
Query PicoClaw health via picoclaw adapter /health endpoint
Query HexStrike-AI health via hexstrike adapter /health endpoint
Verify all agents can resolve their own credentials
Compare actual state against expected identity configuration
Report findings: identity drift across agents, stale credentials, access issues
